title: Local newsrooms will play more
description: Too many journalists still debate who “counts” while dismissing creators who’ve earned trust through presence, not bylines. Meanwhile, the data is out: 40% of people avoid the news because it’s a bummer. But when one journalist speaks up about play, it inspires another and another, as my recent post about playful local journalism proved. Play...
